Title: Establishes the end toxic home flipping act
Summary: Establishes the end toxic home flipping act; imposes a tax on the transfer of certain residential properties which are sold within two years of the prior conveyance of such property; exempts certain purchases of residential properties from mortgage recording taxes; imposes a tax on the transfer of certain properties in the city of New York which are sold for one million dollars or more.
LawCode: Add ยง11-2120, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the imposition of tax on the transfer of certain properties in the city of New York
